summary: Egon Olsen's criminal trio always gets itself into unlucky, comical situations when executing Egon's genius plans. After release from prison, Egon already has a new plan - steal a valuable German item from a secured museum in Copenhagen.
cast: Ove Sprogøe|Morten Grunwald|Poul Bundgaard|Peter Steen|Poul Reichhardt|Kirsten Walther|Lotte Tarp|Grethe Sønck|Hanne Løye|Lise Henningsen|Ole Monty|Paul Hagen|Arthur Jensen|Ejner Federspiel|Poul Thomsen|Ulf Pilgaard|Ebba Amfeldt|Einar Juhl|Valsø Holm|Gunnar Bigum|Ego Brønnum-Jacobsen|Asger Clausen|Edward Fleming|Lone Gersel|Benny Hansen|Sten Hasager|Knud Hilding|Jes Holtsø|Perry Knudsen|Ernst Meyer|Claus Nissen|Bjørn Puggaard-Müller|Søren Rode|Bjørn Spiro|Gunnar Strømvad|Solveig Sundborg
title: Olsen-banden
